VIII.iv.2.B.3.b
.
Record Group 389, Records of the PMGO:Â  Lists From the American POW Information Bureau
Record Group 389
,
Records of the Office of the PMGO
, contains lists from the American POW Information Bureau, Records Branch, in the General Subject File, for the period 1942 to 1946.
Countries included in the lists are
Germany
Japan, and
the Philippines.
The listings are arranged
first by country of internment, then
by location of camp, and finally
alphabetically by name.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Service Records
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
